ing: 1 cup chopped red or green grapes
2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint or cilantro
des: "This yogurt-y condiment goes perfectly with spicier dishes, and takes just a few minutes to toss together. You can use either fresh fruit or veggies."
ins: Whisk together yogurt, cumin seeds, salt, and cayenne pepper. Stir in fruit (or vegetables) and herbs. Adjust seasoning to taste. Chill thoroughly.
